allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Implement partial/itemized payment for bill splitting

This commit adds full support for partial payments, allowing customers to pay for specific items while leaving others unpaid. Tables remain occupied until all items are paid.

Key changes:
- Added isPaid and paidAt fields to OrderItem model
- Created API endpoint to fetch unpaid items for a table
- Updated itemized checkout to load unpaid items from database
- Modified payment API to handle partial payments with itemIds
- Updated payment page to support partial payment flow
- Admin dashboard now shows only unpaid items per table
- Table automatically becomes AVAILABLE when all items are paid

Database changes:
- OrderItem.isPaid (Boolean, default false)
- OrderItem.paidAt (DateTime, nullable)
- Added index on (orderId, isPaid) for performance
EOF
)")
